description.title: Displays customer and order details from Magento
description.value: Displays customer and order details from Magento.

label.title: Label for the Magento Store URL
Label for the Magento Store Code. See for example: https://support.google.com/business/answer/4542487?hl=en

help_text.title: Helper text for the Magento Store Code
help_text.value: Add the default store code you use, if you have 'Add Store Code to Urls' set to 'Yes' on your Magento store.

label.title: Label for the Magento Access token
Label for the Zendesk Order ID Field ID

customer_since.title: When the customer first became a customer

billing.title: The billing address of the customer

shipping.title: The shipping address of the customer

order.title: A title for the order section which displays details about the order

guest.title: If a customer if a guest of the store

message.title: Please try the previous action again
message.value: Please try the previous action again.

server.title: An error occurred while communicating with the Magento server
server.value: The request failed. Please ensure your configuration is correct and try again.

data.title: An error occurred while reading the ticket
data.value: Ticket data could not be read.

noprofile.title: Error message displayed when the customer doesn't exist

loading.title: Details about the customer are loading
loading.value: Waiting for ticket data to load...

requesting.title: Data is being requested from Magento

id.title: Recent orders the customer has completed

status.title: The status of the recent orders
The current status of the order

store.title: Which store the order was placed through

total.title: The total amount of the order

message.title: Data is being requested from Magento

no_address.title: No address is present for that user

pending.title: Pending orders are brand new orders that have not been processed.

processing.title: Processing orders are orders that have been assigned an invoice.

pending_payment.title: Pending Payment orders are brand new orders that have not been cleared by a payment gateway.

payment_review.title: Payment Review means that the order is currently under review on the payment gateway.

suspected_fraud.title: Suspected Fraud means that the order has been flagged by Magento as possible fraud.

holded.title: On Hold means no further action can be done on the order until it is taken off hold.

complete.title: Orders marked as complete have been invoiced and have shipped.

closed.title: Closed orders are orders that have had a credit memo assigned to it and the customer has been refunded.

canceled.title: Cancelled orders are for orders that have been cancelled such as if the order has not been paid for.

paypal_reversed.title: Status specific for Paypal processed orders which has been reversed and refunded.

paypal_canceled_reversal.title: Status specific for Paypal processed orders which has been reversed but subsequently reprocessed.

pending_paypal.title: Status specific for Paypal processed orders which has been set to pending on Paypal's System.
